maqras.text: And on that day, We leave some of them roll among others, and the trumpet is blown, then We gather them altogether
And on that day, We present hell to the disbelievers, in plain view
those whose eyes were in a cover from My remembrance, and they could not hear (the truth)
Did those who disbelieved think that they take My servants as their protectors instead of Me? Indeed We prepared hell for the disbelievers as an entertainment
Say: should We inform you about the worst losers' actions
(Works of) those whose effort is lost in this world’s life and they think indeed they do good work
They are those who disbelieved in their Master's signs and in meeting Him (in the hereafter), so their works became useless, and We do not assign any weight to them on the resurrection day
That is their payback, hell, because they disbelieved and took My signs and My messengers as a joke
Indeed those who believed and did good works, they have gardens of the paradise as an entertainment
remaining in there forever, and they will not look for moving from it
Say: if the sea becomes ink for (writing) the words of my Master, the sea certainly run out before the words of my Master run out, even if we bring another (sea) like it as help

Say: I am only a human being like you, it is revealed to me that your god is the One god, so whoever is hoping to meet his Master, then he should do good work and he should not make any partner in serving his Master
H.Y.A.S. (Kaf. Ha. Ya. Ain. Sud)
(This is) a reminder of your Master’s mercy to His servant Zachariah
When he called his Master, a private calling
He said: my Master, indeed my bones have weakened and my head has turned white (from old age), and I have not been unhappy about praying to you, my Master
And indeed I am afraid of my relatives after me (when I am dead), and my wife is infertile, so give me an heir from Yourself
to inherit from me and inherit from Jacob’s family. And my Master, make him pleasing
(He was told): Zachariah, indeed We give you good news of a boy, his name is Yahya (John the Baptist), We did not give anyone his name (or attribute) in the past
He said: my Master, how can there be a son for me while my wife is infertile and I have reached the very old age
He (the angel) said: it is so, your Master says: it is easy for Me, and I have created you in the past while you were nothing
He said: my Master, give me a sign. He said: your sign is that you will not speak to the people for three nights (being) sound (and healthy)
So he went out of the chamber (place of prayer) to his people, and revealed to them (by sign language) to glorify (God) morning and evening
Yahya, take the book firmly. And We gave him the wisdom from childhood
and sympathy and purity (and integrity) from Us, and he was in control of himself
and good (and kind) to his parent, and he was not a disobeying bully
And peace (and well-being) upon him the day he was born and the day he dies and the day he is raised to life
And mention Mary in the book, when she withdrew from her family to an eastern place
She took a partition (to separate herself) from them, then We sent Our spirit (Gabriel) to her, and he looked like a perfect human being to her
She said: I look for protection of the beneficent from you, if you control yourself (then get away from me)
He said: I am only a messenger of your Master to present you a pure (and righteous) boy
She said: how can I have a son while no man has ever touched me, and I was not unchaste
He said: so it is, your Master says: it is easy for Me, and We make him a sign for the people and a mercy from Us, and it is a matter already decided
